Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6345 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6345 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pip is earlier than 24.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-6345
